

	def test_{{name}}(self):
		# TODO : Replace All Input {{http}}
		res = self.client().{{http|lower}}('{{rooUrl}}{{http_url}}', headers={'user': g.user},
		{%- if http.lower() != 'get' %} json={
		{%- for key, value in docstring.items() %}
		    "{{key}}": "{{value}}"{%-if not loop.last -%}, {%- endif -%}
		{%- endfor %}
		}
		{%- else %} params={
		{%- for key, value in docstring.items() %}
		    '{{key}}': '{{value}}'{%-if not loop.last -%}, {%- endif -%}
		{%- endfor %}
		}
		{%- endif %})
		self.assertIs(res.status_code, 200)
